details:
bareFTP is a simple ftp client for the GNOME desktop. It supports the FTP,
 FTPS and SSH (SFTP) protocols. It also supports: resume and append, active
 and passive mode, browse during file transfers, boomarks and drag and drop.
 protocol::sftp, protocol::ssh, protocol::ssl, role::program,
 uitoolkit::gtk, use::downloading, works-with::file, x11::application
